channel.title: Adding 1 item per death :O need help please (Delta base)
channel.description: i guys i would like to add a mystery box for every kill..expext for the same ip..like a little pvp drop but every time you kill some one u got 1.. can someone help me please?..

item.title: Adding 1 item per death :O need help please (Delta base)
item.dc:creator: @Processing Processing
item.description:
@Processing wrote:

Not familiar with delta but if you have a pk point system search for the message that appears in the chat for people EX: “you received x pk points” and in that method you can call the addItem(itemid, amount) or whatever method your source uses to add items

Read full topic
